channel.title: Item On Item
channel.description:
I was wondering how I could set it up so that I can make arcane spirit shield out of arcane sigil, spirit shield and holy elixer in a 317. I know that I cud do it like this:
[code] if ((itemUsed == #### && useWith == ####) || (itemUsed == #### && useWith == ####)){ deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1); deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1); addItem(####, 1);} [/code]
but that wouldnt mean you wud need the elixer in invent to do it. If I could get it to work fine like that ^ but get it to check invent for elixer it would be perfect.

item.title: Item On Item
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Dev Dark_Dev
item.description:
@Dark_Dev wrote:

Thanks adam you pwn. (I would rep if I could but im not 15 rep yet.)

item.title: Item On Item
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Dev Dark_Dev
item.description:
@Dark_Dev wrote:

Thanks, just to make sure…

if (itemUsed == #### && useWith == ###) || (itemUsed == #### && useWith == ###)
{
if (playerHasItem(####, #)
{
deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1);
deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1);
addItem(####, 1);

}

}

Like that?

Read full topic

item.title: Item On Item
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Dev Dark_Dev
item.description:
@Dark_Dev wrote:

so what would the finished code look like? (Sorry guys im completely new to coding.)

if ((itemUsed == #### && useWith == ####) || (itemUsed == #### && useWith == ####))
if(playerHasItem(####, #) == true)
{
deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1);
deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1);
addItem(####, 1);
}

Don’t supose that’s right?

Read full topic

item.title: Item On Item
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“Dark_Dev, post:1, topic:326460”]I was wondering how I could set it up so that I can make arcane spirit shield out of arcane sigil, spirit shield and holy elixer in a 317. I know that I cud do it like this:

if ((itemUsed == #### && useWith == ####) || (itemUsed == #### && useWith == ####)){    deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1);    deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1);    addItem(####, 1);}

but that wouldnt mean you wud need the elixer in invent to do it. If I could get it to work fine like that ^ but get it to check invent for elixer it would be perfect.[/quote]

Those conventions are horrible…

if(playerHasItem(####, #) == true) That should be correct. #### = Item ID, # = Amount (1)

Read full topic
